content.text:
# Pattiwaras

| footnotes               =
}}
Pattiwaras is a village in Sultanpur Lodhi in Kapurthala district of Punjab State, India. It is located  from sub district headquarter and  from district headquarter. The village is administrated by Sarpanch an elected representative of the village.
Demography
, The village has a total number of 1 houses and the population of 5 of which 3 are males while 2 are females.  According to the report published by Census India in 2011, out of the total population of the village 0 people are from Schedule Caste and the village does not have any Schedule Tribe population so far.

*List of villages in India
